12/11/on-microbiomes/">On&nbsp;Microbiomes</a></h2><pclass="entry-filed">Filedunder:<spanclass="entry-categories"><ahref="http://ma.tt/category/ideas/"title="ViewallpostsinIdeas"rel="categorytag">Ideas</a></span></p><pclass="entry-tagged"><spanclass="entry-tags"></span></p><divclass="double-dashed"></div><p><imgclass="alignrightwp-image-42003"alt=""src="http://i0.wp.com/s.ma.tt/files/2012/11/EscherichiaColi_NIAID.jpg?resize=257%2C216"/>Yourbodyhasabouttentimesthenumberofmicrobialcellsasitdoeshumancells.Collectivelythisbacteriaweighsaboutthreepounds,aboutthesameasyourbrain.Theevolutionofourunderstandingofthesebacteriahasbeenevolvingrapidlyoverthepasttwentyyears,andIexpectitsfindingstobethemostimpactfulonourhealthandwellnessinthecomingdecades.</p><p><ahref="http://www.newyorker.com/reporting/2012/10/22/121022fa_fact_specter">TheNewYorkerhasafantasticarticlebyMichaelSpecter</a>thatstartsandendswithourchangingperceptionof<i>heliobacterpylori</i>,linkedtogastritisandpepticulcers,butwhoseabsenceinchildren(itusedtobeuniversal,nowfewerthan5%ofchildrenintheUScarryitintheirguts)islinkedtoasthma.Italsohasconsequencesforweight:</p><divclass="blockquote"><blockquote>Thereisequallyconvincingevidencethatdestroying<i>H.pylori</i>couldaltermetabolisminwaysthatincreasetheriskofobesity.Severalresearchgroups,includingBlaser’s,havefoundastrongrelationshipinhumansbetweenthebacteriumandtwostomachhormones,ghrelinandleptin,bothofwhichplaycentralrolesinregulatingourappetites[...]Themoreghrelinyouhaveinyourbloodstream,themorelikelyyouaretoovereat.Leptinfunctionsintheoppositeway,suppressingappetiteandincreasingenergylevels.Forpeoplewhosestomachsareinfectedby<i>H.pylori</i>,ghrelinbecamefarlessdetectableafterameal.Fortheothers,levelsofthehormoneremainedhigh,andtheeffectsareevident.[...]</p><p>Thatfindingwasnotacompletesurprise.Roughlythree-quartersoftheantibioticsconsumedintheUnitedStatesarefedtopoultry,cows,andpigs,nottotreatillnessbutasdietarysupplementstopromotefastergrowth.[...]Untilrecently,thebiochemicalreasonsforthatweightgain,anditsunsettlingimplicationsorhumans,weremurky.[...]&#8220;Alotofthingsarehappeningatonce,&#8221;hesaid.&#8220;Theriseinobesity,celiacdisease,asthma,allergysyndromes,andType1diabetes.Badeatinghabitsarenotsufficienttoexplaintheworld-wideexplosioninobesity.</p></blockquote></div><p>Theenvironmentinsideourbodyisascomplexandvariedastheoneoutsideourbodyandrespondsjustasunpredictablytowholesalechangestoitsecosystem.I&#8217;drecommendreadingtheentirearticle,unfortunatelyit&#8217;s<ahref="http://www.newyorker.com/reporting/2012/10/22/121022fa_fact_specter">notavailableinitsentirety</a>ontheNewYorker&#8217;ssite,however<ahref="http://s.ma.tt/files/2012/11/new-yorker-2012-10-22-microbiome.pdf">here&#8217;saPDFoftheentirething</a>.</p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div><divclass="post-41997posttype-poststatus-publishformat-quotehentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><divclass="single-dashed"></div><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonLivingWithout&nbsp;Irony"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/living-without-irony/#comments"><spanclass="count">3</span></a><divclass="blockquote"><blockquote>[...]thenostalgiacycleshavebecomesoshortthatweeventrytoinjectthepresentmomentwithsentimentality,forexample,byusingcertaindigitalfiltersto&#8220;pre-wash&#8221;photoswithanauraofhistoricity.Nostalgianeedstime.Onecannotacceleratemeaningfulremembrance.</p></blockquote></div><p>FromChristyWampole&#8217;s<ahref="http://opinionator.blogs.nytimes.com/2012/11/17/how-to-live-without-irony/">HowtoLiveWithoutIrony</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/living-without-irony/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-15T23:45:48+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">15</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41995posttype-poststatus-publishformat-asidehentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonBitcoinon&nbsp;WordPress.com"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/bitcoin-on-wordpress-com/#comments"><spanclass="count">9</span></a><p><ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/11/15/pay-another-way-bitcoin/">WordPress.comnowacceptspaymentsviaBitcoin</a>,possiblythelargestinternetserviceyettoadoptit.IfindBitcoinintrinsicallyinteresting<ahref="http://www.newyorker.com/reporting/2011/10/10/111010fa_fact_davis">asacrypto-currency</a>,butitalsomightopenupourpremiumservicestofolkswhocouldn&#8217;tusethembefore.It&#8217;sbeenfuntowatchthestoreengineofWP.comevolvebehindthescenes.InotherWordPress.comnews,therearenowverticalsfor<ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/11/14/wordpress-for-cities/">municipalities</a>and<ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/10/30/make-your-bands-site-sing/">bands</a>,andwecompiled<ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/11/05/the-wordpress-bestseller-list/">anincompletelistofbest-sellingauthorsonWordPress</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/bitcoin-on-wordpress-com/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-14T06:54:09+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">14</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41989posttype-poststatus-publishformat-linkhentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonWP&nbsp;Maze"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/wp-maze/#comments"><spanclass="count">6</span></a><p>ErickJeckerthasmadea<ahref="http://ericjeckert.com/mazes/matt-mullenweg/">mazewithmyfaceandtheWordPresslogo</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/wp-maze/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-12T15:03:13+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">12</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41987posttype-poststatus-publishformat-asidehentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonRollingJubileeof&nbsp;Debt"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/rolling-jubilee-of-debt/#comments"><spanclass="count">2</span></a><p><ahref="http://rollingjubilee.org/">RollingJubilee</a>isanon-profitthattakesdonationstobuydistresseddebtforpenniesonthedollar,andthenabolishesit.Donate$100andtheycantake$2,000offsomeone&#8217;sback.Seemslikeanamazingrandomactofkindness,you&#8217;llneverknowwhoyouhelped.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/rolling-jubilee-of-debt/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-10T08:10:18+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">10</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41985posttype-poststatus-publishformat-standardhentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonUSTechnology&nbsp;Agenda"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/us-technology-agenda/#comments"><spanclass="count">7</span></a><p>Wiredwriteson<ahref="http://www.wired.com/business/2012/11/what-tech-wants-from-four-more-years/all/">The8MissionsThatShouldDominateObama&#8217;sTechnologyAgenda</a>.I&#8217;mquotedthere,butherearemyfullresponsestothequestionstheyasked:</p><divclass="blockquote"><blockquote><strong>1.Firstoff,howdidyoumonitortheelectionresults–phone,TV,twitterlaptop,twitter,barstool?</strong></p><p>Iwasatafriend’shousewithaboutadozenpeoplewatchingmostlyCNN,andreadingTweetbotonaniPadMini.</p><p><strong>2.Assomeoneleadingatechcompany(orasaninvestor),whatareyoulookingforthepresidenttodooverthenextfouryears?ArethereprioritiesyouhavethattheWhiteHousecouldhelpyouachieve?Eitherfromabusinessperspective,oratechnological/hiring/infrastructurepointofview?</strong></p><p>AtamacrolevelIhopethePresidentkeepstheeconomyonapathtorecovery,andstaysontherightsideofanti-interneteffortslikeSOPA.Whatwe’rebuildingwiththewebistooearlytobemarginalizedbyspecialinterestssoearlyinitsgrowth.</p><p>Onapersonallevel,Ihopehekeepsfightingforprotectionsandprivilegesunderthelawformynon-straightcolleagues.</p><p>Butthemostimportantthingsweneedtodowilllikelynothaveabigeffectbefore2016.AsacountryAmericaneedstoinvestinitsinfrastructure,particularlybroadband,education,particularlySTEM,andinstreamliningimmigration,sothebestandbrightestwhocometoourshoresaren’tshownthedoorwhentheygraduatefromoneoftheleadinguniversitiesintheworld.Fouryearsistooshortofatimeframefortheseinvestmentstopayoffbutthat’sokaybecauseI’minbusinessforthelongrunandIwanttoseeourcountrystrengthenandprosperovergenerations,notjustthenexteconomiccycle.</p><p><strong>3.Werethereanyotherraces,measuresetc.thatyouwereparticularlyinterestedin,andwhy?Whatwastheoutcome,andwhydidyoucaresomuch?</strong></p><p>Ifollowedafewofthesenateandhouseraces,mostlyastheyrelatedtoSOPAandPIPA,andthestatemarriageequalitymeasures.</p><p><strong>4.Or,doesallthispoliticsstuffhavezerobearingonwhatyouaredoing?</strong></p><p>Eventhoughthepoliticalprocessoftenfrustratesme,I’veseenitsabilitytoinfluencethelivesofmyfriends,family,andcolleaguestoomanytimestoignoreitanymore.</p></blockquote></div><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/us-technology-agenda/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><divid="infinite-content"></div><divclass="navigation"><divclass="prev"><ahref="http://ma.tt/page/2/">&lt;OlderPosts</a></div><brstyle="clear:both;"/></div></section><aside><ul><liclass="widget-containerabout-box"><divid="mattbio"><imgsrc="http://s.ma.tt/blog-content/themes/matt2010/images/frame1.png"/></div><h3class="widget-title">MattMullenweg</h3><pclass="text">isoneofPCWorld&#8217;sTop50PeopleontheWeb,Inc.com&#8217;s30under30,BusinessWeek&#8217;s25MostInfluentialPeopleontheWeb,andVanityFair&#8217;sNextEstablishment.He&#8217;son<ahref="http://twitter.com/photomatt">Twitter</a>and<ahref="http://facebook.com/matt.mullenweg">Facebook</a>.</p><p><aclass="link"href="http://ma.tt/about/">More&gt;</a></p></li><liclass="widget-containerrandom-photo"><h3class="widget-title">RandomPhoto</h3><divstyle="width:187px;height:124px;backgro ecter</a>thatstartsandendswithourchangingperceptionof<i>heliobacterpylori</i>,linkedtogastritisandpepticulcers,butwhoseabsenceinchildren(itusedtobeuniversal,nowfewerthan5%ofchildrenintheUScarryitintheirguts)islinkedtoasthma.Italsohasconsequencesforweight:</p><divclass="blockquote"><blockquote>Thereisequallyconvincingevidencethatdestroying<i>H.pylori</i>couldaltermetabolisminwaysthatincreasetheriskofobesity.Severalresearchgroups,includingBlaser’s,havefoundastrongrelationshipinhumansbetweenthebacteriumandtwostomachhormones,ghrelinandleptin,bothofwhichplaycentralrolesinregulatingourappetites[...]Themoreghrelinyouhaveinyourbloodstream,themorelikelyyouaretoovereat.Leptinfunctionsintheoppositeway,suppressingappetiteandincreasingenergylevels.Forpeoplewhosestomachsareinfectedby<i>H.pylori</i>,ghrelinbecamefarlessdetectableafterameal.Fortheothers,levelsofthehormoneremainedhigh,andtheeffectsareevident.[...]</p><p>Thatfindingwasnotacompletesurprise.Roughlythree-quartersoftheantibioticsconsumedintheUnitedStatesarefedtopoultry,cows,andpigs,nottotreatillnessbutasdietarysupplementstopromotefastergrowth.[...]Untilrecently,thebiochemicalreasonsforthatweightgain,anditsunsettlingimplicationsorhumans,weremurky.[...]&#8220;Alotofthingsarehappeningatonce,&#8221;hesaid.&#8220;Theriseinobesity,celiacdisease,asthma,allergysyndromes,andType1diabetes.Badeatinghabitsarenotsufficienttoexplaintheworld-wideexplosioninobesity.</p></blockquote></div><p>Theenvironmentinsideourbodyisascomplexandvariedastheoneoutsideourbodyandrespondsjustasunpredictablytowholesalechangestoitsecosystem.I&#8217;drecommendreadingtheentirearticle,unfortunatelyit&#8217;s<ahref="http://www.newyorker.com/reporting/2012/10/22/121022fa_fact_specter">notavailableinitsentirety</a>ontheNewYorker&#8217;ssite,however<ahref="http://s.ma.tt/files/2012/11/new-yorker-2012-10-22-microbiome.pdf">here&#8217;saPDFoftheentirething</a>.</p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div><divclass="post-41997posttype-poststatus-publishformat-quotehentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><divclass="single-dashed"></div><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonLivingWithout&nbsp;Irony"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/living-without-irony/#comments"><spanclass="count">3</span></a><divclass="blockquote"><blockquote>[...]thenostalgiacycleshavebecomesoshortthatweeventrytoinjectthepresentmomentwithsentimentality,forexample,byusingcertaindigitalfiltersto&#8220;pre-wash&#8221;photoswithanauraofhistoricity.Nostalgianeedstime.Onecannotacceleratemeaningfulremembrance.</p></blockquote></div><p>FromChristyWampole&#8217;s<ahref="http://opinionator.blogs.nytimes.com/2012/11/17/how-to-live-without-irony/">HowtoLiveWithoutIrony</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/living-without-irony/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-15T23:45:48+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">15</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41995posttype-poststatus-publishformat-asidehentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonBitcoinon&nbsp;WordPress.com"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/bitcoin-on-wordpress-com/#comments"><spanclass="count">9</span></a><p><ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/11/15/pay-another-way-bitcoin/">WordPress.comnowacceptspaymentsviaBitcoin</a>,possiblythelargestinternetserviceyettoadoptit.IfindBitcoinintrinsicallyinteresting<ahref="http://www.newyorker.com/reporting/2011/10/10/111010fa_fact_davis">asacrypto-currency</a>,butitalsomightopenupourpremiumservicestofolkswhocouldn&#8217;tusethembefore.It&#8217;sbeenfuntowatchthestoreengineofWP.comevolvebehindthescenes.InotherWordPress.comnews,therearenowverticalsfor<ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/11/14/wordpress-for-cities/">municipalities</a>and<ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/10/30/make-your-bands-site-sing/">bands</a>,andwecompiled<ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/11/05/the-wordpress-bestseller-list/">anincompletelistofbest-sellingauthorsonWordPress</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/bitcoin-on-wordpress-com/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-14T06:54:09+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">14</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41989posttype-poststatus-publishformat-linkhentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonWP&nbsp;Maze"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/wp-maze/#comments"><spanclass="count">6</span></a><p>ErickJeckerthasmadea<ahref="http://ericjeckert.com/mazes/matt-mullenweg/">mazewithmyfaceandtheWordPresslogo</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/wp-maze/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-12T15:03:13+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">12</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41987posttype-poststatus-publishformat-asidehentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonRollingJubileeof&nbsp;Debt"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/rolling-jubilee-of-debt/#comments"><spanclass="count">2</span></a><p><ahref="http://rollingjubilee.org/">RollingJubilee</a>isanon-profitthattakesdonationstobuydistresseddebtforpenniesonthedollar,andthenabolishesit.Donate$100andtheycantake$2,000offsomeone&#8217;sback.Seemslikeanamazingrandomactofkindness,you&#8217;llneverknowwhoyouhelped.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/rolling-jubilee-of-debt/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-10T08:10:18+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">10</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41985posttype-poststatus-publishformat-standardhentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonUSTechnology&nbsp;Agenda"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/us-technology-agenda/#comments"><spanclass="count">7</span></a><p>Wiredwriteson<ahref="http://www.wired.com/business/2012/11/what-tech-wants-from-four-more-years/all/">The8MissionsThatShouldDominateObama&#8217;sTechnologyAgenda</a>.I&#8217;mquotedthere,butherearemyfullresponsestothequestionstheyasked:</p><divclass="blockquote"><blockquote><strong>1.Firstoff,howdidyoumonitortheelectionresults–phone,TV,twitterlaptop,twitter,barstool?</strong></p><p>Iwasatafriend’shousewithaboutadozenpeoplewatchingmostlyCNN,andreadingTweetbotonaniPadMini.</p><p><strong>2.Assomeoneleadingatechcompany(orasaninvestor),whatareyoulookingforthepresidenttodooverthenextfouryears?ArethereprioritiesyouhavethattheWhiteHousecouldhelpyouachieve?Eitherfromabusinessperspective,oratechnological/hiring/infrastructurepointofview?</strong></p><p>AtamacrolevelIhopethePresidentkeepstheeconomyonapathtorecovery,andstaysontherightsideofanti-interneteffortslikeSOPA.Whatwe’rebuildingwiththewebistooearlytobemarginalizedbyspecialinterestssoearlyinitsgrowth.</p><p>Onapersonallevel,Ihopehekeepsfightingforprotectionsandprivilegesunderthelawformynon-straightcolleagues.</p><p>Butthemostimportantthingsweneedtodowilllikelynothaveabigeffectbefore2016.AsacountryAmericaneedstoinvestinitsinfrastructure,particularlybroadband,education,particularlySTEM,andinstreamliningimmigration,sothebestandbrightestwhocometoourshoresaren’tshownthedoorwhentheygraduatefromoneoftheleadinguniversitiesintheworld.Fouryearsistooshortofatimeframefortheseinvestmentstopayoffbutthat’sokaybecauseI’minbusinessforthelongrunandIwanttoseeourcountrystrengthenandprosperovergenerations,notjustthenexteconomiccycle.</p><p><strong>3.Werethereanyotherraces,measuresetc.thatyouwereparticularlyinterestedin,andwhy?Whatwastheoutcome,andwhydidyoucaresomuch?</strong></p><p>Ifollowedafewofthesenateandhouseraces,mostlyastheyrelatedtoSOPAandPIPA,andthestatemarriageequalitymeasures.</p><p><strong>4.Or,doesallthispoliticsstuffhavezerobearingonwhatyouaredoing?</strong></p><p>Eventhoughthepoliticalprocessoftenfrustratesme,I’veseenitsabilitytoinfluencethelivesofmyfriends,family,andcolleaguestoomanytimestoignoreitanymore.</p></blockquote></div><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/us-technology-agenda/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><divid="infinite-content"></div><divclass="navigation"><divclass="prev"><ahref="http://ma.tt/page/2/">&lt;OlderPosts</a></div><brstyle="clear:both;"/></div></section><aside><ul><liclass="widget-containerabout-box"><divid="mattbio"><imgsrc="http://s.ma.tt/blog-content/themes/matt2010/images/frame1.png"/></div><h3class="widget-title">MattMullenweg</h3><pclass="text">isoneofPCWorld&#8217;sTop50PeopleontheWeb,Inc.com&#8217;s30under30,BusinessWeek&#8217;s25MostInfluentialPeopleontheWeb,andVanityFair&#8217;sNextEstablishment.He&#8217;son<ahref="http://twitter.com/photomatt">Twitter</a>and<ahref="http://facebook.com/matt.mullenweg">Facebook</a>.</p><p><aclass="link"href="http://ma.tt/about/">More&gt;</a></p></li><liclass="widget-containerrandom-photo"><h3class="widget-title">RandomPhoto</h3><divstyle="width:187px;height:124px;background-image:url(http://s.ma.tt/files/2010/02/MCM_8434.jpg)"class="randsidebar"><ahref="http://ma.tt/2010/02/lianes-birthday/mcm_8434/#container"><imgsrc="http://s.ma.tt/blog-content/themes/matt2010/images/frame1.png"width="196"height="141"/></a></div><br/><p><aclass="link"href="http://ma.tt/random-photos/">MoreRandom&gt;</a></p></li><liclass="widget-containertwitter-photomatt"><h3class="widget-title">@photomatt</h3><divid="twitter_update_list"></div><scripttype="text/javascript"src="http://s.ma.tt/blog-content/themes/matt2010/js/twitter.js?43"></script><scripttype="text/javascript"src="http://api.twitter.com/1/statuses/user_timeline.json?callback=twitterCallback2&amp;screen_name=photomatt&amp;count=3&amp;include_rts=1"></script><br/><p><aclass="link"href="http://twitter.com/photomatt/">FollowmeonTwitter&gt;</a></p></li><liclass="widget-containerrecent-essays"><h3class ncausesrandomstatetobevisible.Pingservertocleanitup*/if($('#sp_menu').length!=0){vartimestamp=newDate().getTime();/*Avoidcachingbyappending'random'number*/$.ajax({url:"/session_projects?"+timestamp,success:SessionProjects.success});}},enable:function(){/*Updateallcheckboxesonpagetomatchthoseinthemenu.*Thisisprimarilysothatstatewillbecleanedupafterbackbutton*/$('.sp_input').prop('checked',false);$('#sp_menu.sp_input').each(function(){$('.sp_input[project_id="'+$(this).attr('project_id')+'"]').prop('checked',true);});if($('#sp_menu.sp_input').filter(':checked').length<3){/*Allcheckboxesareenabled*/$('.sp_input').unbind('change').bind('change',SessionProjects.change).prop('disabled',false).parent().removeClass('disabled');}else{/*Projectlimitreached.Canonlyuncheckcheckboxes*/$('.sp_input').filter(':checked').unbind('change').bind('change',SessionProjects.change).prop('disabled',false).parent().removeClass('disabled');SessionProjects.disableUnchecked();}/*Animatetheappearance/disappearanceofmenu*/varheight='0';if($('#sp_menu.sp_input').length>0){height='3.5em';}$('#sp_menu').animate({'height':height},{duration:300});},disableUnchecked:function(){$('.sp_input').not(':checked').unbind('change').prop('disabled',true).parent().addClass('disabled');},busy_span:"<spanclass='busy'style='padding:08px8px'>&nbsp;</span>",compare_span:"<spanclass='sp_label'>Compare</span>",change:function(){varchecked=$(this).is(':checked');varproject_id=$(this).attr('project_id');varsel=$('.sp_input[project_id="'+project_id+'"]');sel.siblings('span').replaceWith(SessionProjects.busy_span);sel.prop('checked',checked).prop('disabled',true);SessionProjects.disableUnchecked();if(checked){$.ajax({type:"POST",url:"/session_projects?project_id="+project_id,success:SessionProjects.success});}else{$.ajax({type:"POST",url:"/session_projects/"+project_id,data:{'_method':'delete'},success:SessionProjects.success});}returnfalse;},success:function(data,textStatus,jqXHR){$("#sp_menu").html(data);$('.busy').repl eyup=function(e){if(e==null){keycode=event.keyCode;}else{//mozillakeycode=e.which;}if(keycode==27){//closetb_remove_without_refresh();}}}functiontb_remove_without_refresh(){$("#TB_imageOff").unbind("click");$("#TB_closeWindowButton").unbind("click");$("#TB_window").fadeOut("fast",function(){$('#TB_window,#TB_overlay,#TB_HideSelect').trigger("unload").unbind().remove();});$("#TB_load").remove();if(typeofdocument.body.style.maxHeight=="undefined"){//ifIE6$("body","html").css({height:"auto",width:"auto"});$("html").css("overflow","");}document.onkeydown="";document.onkeyup="";returnfalse;}//Aftertriggeringthetb_show,thepopupcloseneedstobetriggeredvarPopupClose={init:function(){varoriginal_tb_show=tb_show;tb_show=function(){$(document).trigger('tb_show');original_tb_show.apply(this,arguments);popup_close_without_refresh();}}}/***ThickBoxHacktoclosethepopupwindowwithoutrefreshingthepage-END**/<!DOCTYPEhtmlPUBLIC"-//W3C//DTDXHTML1.0Strict//EN""http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><!--[ifltIE7]><htmlclass="ie6"xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"dir="ltr"lang="en-US"xmlns:og="http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/"><![endif]--><!--[ifIE7]><htmlclass="ie7"xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"dir="ltr"lang="en-US"xmlns:og="http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/"><![endif]--><!--[ifIE8]><htmlclass="ie8"xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"dir="ltr"lang="en-US"xmlns:og="http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/"><![endif]--><!--[ifIE9]><htmlclass="ie9"xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"dir="ltr"lang="en-US"xmlns:og="http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/"><![endif]--><!--[if(gtIE9)|!(IE)]><!--><htmlxmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"dir="ltr"lang="en-US"xmlns:og="http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/"><!--<![endif]--><headprofile="http://gmpg.org/xfn/11"><metahttp-equiv="Content-Type"content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><metahttp-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"content="IE=edge,chrome=1"><metaname="viewport"content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1"><title>JobsinGhana–JobVacanciesinG p-image-42003"alt=""src="http://i0.wp.com/s.ma.tt/files/2012/11/EscherichiaColi_NIAID.jpg?resize=257%2C216"/>Yourbodyhasabouttentimesthenumberofmicrobialcellsasitdoeshumancells.Collectivelythisbacteriaweighsaboutthreepounds,aboutthesameasyourbrain.Theevolutionofourunderstandingofthesebacteriahasbeenevolvingrapidlyoverthepasttwentyyears,andIexpectitsfindingstobethemostimpactfulonourhealthandwellnessinthecomingdecades.</p><p><ahref="http://www.newyorker.com/reporting/2012/10/22/121022fa_fact_specter">TheNewYorkerhasafantasticarticlebyMichaelSpecter</a>thatstartsandendswithourchangingperceptionof<i>heliobacterpylori</i>,linkedtogastritisandpepticulcers,butwhoseabsenceinchildren(itusedtobeuniversal,nowfewerthan5%ofchildrenintheUScarryitintheirguts)islinkedtoasthma.Italsohasconsequencesforweight:</p><divclass="blockquote"><blockquote>Thereisequallyconvincingevidencethatdestroying<i>H.pylori</i>couldaltermetabolisminwaysthatincreasetheriskofobesity.Severalresearchgroups,includingBlaser’s,havefoundastrongrelationshipinhumansbetweenthebacteriumandtwostomachhormones,ghrelinandleptin,bothofwhichplaycentralrolesinregulatingourappetites[...]Themoreghrelinyouhaveinyourbloodstream,themorelikelyyouaretoovereat.Leptinfunctionsintheoppositeway,suppressingappetiteandincreasingenergylevels.Forpeoplewhosestomachsareinfectedby<i>H.pylori</i>,ghrelinbecamefarlessdetectableafterameal.Fortheothers,levelsofthehormoneremainedhigh,andtheeffectsareevident.[...]</p><p>Thatfindingwasnotacompletesurprise.Roughlythree-quartersoftheantibioticsconsumedintheUnitedStatesarefedtopoultry,cows,andpigs,nottotreatillnessbutasdietarysupplementstopromotefastergrowth.[...]Untilrecently,thebiochemicalreasonsforthatweightgain,anditsunsettlingimplicationsorhumans,weremurky.[...]&#8220;Alotofthingsarehappeningatonce,&#8221;hesaid.&#8220;Theriseinobesity,celiacdisease,asthma,allergysyndromes,andType1diabetes.Badeatinghabitsarenotsufficienttoexplaintheworld-wideexplosioninobesity.</p></blockquote></div><p>Theenvironmentinsideourbodyisascomplexandvariedastheoneoutsideourbodyandrespondsjustasunpredictablytowholesalechangestoitsecosystem.I&#8217;drecommendreadingtheentirearticle,unfortunatelyit&#8217;s<ahref="http://www.newyorker.com/reporting/2012/10/22/121022fa_fact_specter">notavailableinitsentirety</a>ontheNewYorker&#8217;ssite,however<ahref="http://s.ma.tt/files/2012/11/new-yorker-2012-10-22-microbiome.pdf">here&#8217;saPDFoftheentirething</a>.</p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div><divclass="post-41997posttype-poststatus-publishformat-quotehentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><divclass="single-dashed"></div><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonLivingWithout&nbsp;Irony"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/living-without-irony/#comments"><spanclass="count">3</span></a><divclass="blockquote"><blockquote>[...]thenostalgiacycleshavebecomesoshortthatweeventrytoinjectthepresentmomentwithsentimentality,forexample,byusingcertaindigitalfiltersto&#8220;pre-wash&#8221;photoswithanauraofhistoricity.Nostalgianeedstime.Onecannotacceleratemeaningfulremembrance.</p></blockquote></div><p>FromChristyWampole&#8217;s<ahref="http://opinionator.blogs.nytimes.com/2012/11/17/how-to-live-without-irony/">HowtoLiveWithoutIrony</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/living-without-irony/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-15T23:45:48+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">15</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41995posttype-poststatus-publishformat-asidehentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonBitcoinon&nbsp;WordPress.com"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/bitcoin-on-wordpress-com/#comments"><spanclass="count">9</span></a><p><ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/11/15/pay-another-way-bitcoin/">WordPress.comnowacceptspaymentsviaBitcoin</a>,possiblythelargestinternetserviceyettoadoptit.IfindBitcoinintrinsicallyinteresting<ahref="http://www.newyorker.com/reporting/2011/10/10/111010fa_fact_davis">asacrypto-currency</a>,butitalsomightopenupourpremiumservicestofolkswhocouldn&#8217;tusethembefore.It&#8217;sbeenfuntowatchthestoreengineofWP.comevolvebehindthescenes.InotherWordPress.comnews,therearenowverticalsfor<ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/11/14/wordpress-for-cities/">municipalities</a>and<ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/10/30/make-your-bands-site-sing/">bands</a>,andwecompiled<ahref="http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2012/11/05/the-wordpress-bestseller-list/">anincompletelistofbest-sellingauthorsonWordPress</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/bitcoin-on-wordpress-com/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-14T06:54:09+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">14</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41989posttype-poststatus-publishformat-linkhentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonWP&nbsp;Maze"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/wp-maze/#comments"><spanclass="count">6</span></a><p>ErickJeckerthasmadea<ahref="http://ericjeckert.com/mazes/matt-mullenweg/">mazewithmyfaceandtheWordPresslogo</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/wp-maze/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-12T15:03:13+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">12</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41987posttype-poststatus-publishformat-asidehentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonRollingJubileeof&nbsp;Debt"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/rolling-jubilee-of-debt/#comments"><spanclass="count">2</span></a><p><ahref="http://rollingjubilee.org/">RollingJubilee</a>isanon-profitthattakesdonationstobuydistresseddebtforpenniesonthedollar,andthenabolishesit.Donate$100andtheycantake$2,000offsomeone&#8217;sback.Seemslikeanamazingrandomactofkindness,you&#8217;llneverknowwhoyouhelped.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/rolling-jubilee-of-debt/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><article><divclass="datedot"><abbrclass="published"title="2012-11-10T08:10:18+00:00"><spanclass="month">Nov</span><br/><spanclass="day">10</span></abbr></div><divclass="post-41985posttype-poststatus-publishformat-standardhentrycategory-asidesentry-content"><aclass="entry-comment-count"title="CommentsonUSTechnology&nbsp;Agenda"href="http://ma.tt/2012/11/us-technology-agenda/#comments"><spanclass="count">7</span></a><p>Wiredwriteson<ahref="http://www.wired.com/business/2012/11/what-tech-wants-from-four-more-years/all/">The8MissionsThatShouldDominateObama&#8217;sTechnologyAgenda</a>.I&#8217;mquotedthere,butherearemyfullresponsestothequestionstheyasked:</p><divclass="blockquote"><blockquote><strong>1.Firstoff,howdidyoumonitortheelectionresults–phone,TV,twitterlaptop,twitter,barstool?</strong></p><p>Iwasatafriend’shousewithaboutadozenpeoplewatchingmostlyCNN,andreadingTweetbotonaniPadMini.</p><p><strong>2.Assomeoneleadingatechcompany(orasaninvestor),whatareyoulookingforthepresidenttodooverthenextfouryears?ArethereprioritiesyouhavethattheWhiteHousecouldhelpyouachieve?Eitherfromabusinessperspective,oratechnological/hiring/infrastructurepointofview?</strong></p><p>AtamacrolevelIhopethePresidentkeepstheeconomyonapathtorecovery,andstaysontherightsideofanti-interneteffortslikeSOPA.Whatwe’rebuildingwiththewebistooearlytobemarginalizedbyspecialinterestssoearlyinitsgrowth.</p><p>Onapersonallevel,Ihopehekeepsfightingforprotectionsandprivilegesunderthelawformynon-straightcolleagues.</p><p>Butthemostimportantthingsweneedtodowilllikelynothaveabigeffectbefore2016.AsacountryAmericaneedstoinvestinitsinfrastructure,particularlybroadband,education,particularlySTEM,andinstreamliningimmigration,sothebestandbrightestwhocometoourshoresaren’tshownthedoorwhentheygraduatefromoneoftheleadinguniversitiesintheworld.Fouryearsistooshortofatimeframefortheseinvestmentstopayoffbutthat’sokaybecauseI’minbusinessforthelongrunandIwanttoseeourcountrystrengthenandprosperovergenerations,notjustthenexteconomiccycle.</p><p><strong>3.Werethereanyotherraces,measuresetc.thatyouwereparticularlyinterestedin,andwhy?Whatwastheoutcome,andwhydidyoucaresomuch?</strong></p><p>Ifollowedafewofthesenateandhouseraces,mostlyastheyrelatedtoSOPAandPIPA,andthestatemarriageequalitymeasures.</p><p><strong>4.Or,doesallthispoliticsstuffhavezerobearingonwhatyouaredoing?</strong></p><p>Eventhoughthepoliticalprocessoftenfrustratesme,I’veseenitsabilitytoinfluencethelivesofmyfriends,family,andcolleaguestoomanytimestoignoreitanymore.</p></blockquote></div><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<ahref="http://ma.tt/2012/11/us-technology-agenda/">&infin;</a></p><divstyle="clear:both;"></div></div></article><divid="infinite-content"></div><divclass="navigation"><divclass="prev"><ahref="http://ma.tt/page/2/">&lt;OlderPosts</a></div><brstyle="clear:both;"/></div></section><aside><ul><liclass="widget-containerabout-box"><divid="mattbio"><imgsrc="http://s.ma.tt/blog-content/themes/matt2010/images/frame1.png"/></div><h3class="widget-title">MattMullenweg</h3><pclass="text">isoneofPCWorld&#8217;sTop50PeopleontheWeb,Inc.com&#8217;s30under30,BusinessWeek&#8217;s25MostInfluentialPeopleontheWeb,andVanityFair&#8217;sNextEstablishment.He&#8217;son<ahref="http://twitter.com/photomatt">Twitter</a>and<ahref="http://facebook.com/matt.mullenweg">Facebook</a>.</p><p><aclass="link"href="http://ma.tt/about/">More&gt;</a></p></li><liclass="widget-containerrandom-photo"><h3class="widget-title">RandomPhoto</h3><divstyle="width:187px;height:124px;background-image:url(http://s.ma.tt/files/2008/06/mat_1830.jpg)"class="randsidebar"><ahref="http://ma.tt/2008/03/sxsw-day-three/mat_1830/#container"><imgsrc="http://s.ma.tt/blog-content/themes/matt2010/images/frame1.png"width="196"height="141"/></a></div><br/><p><aclass="link"href="http://ma.tt/random-photos/">MoreRandom&gt;</a></p></li "section_content"><imgwidth="250"height="48"src="http://cdn.joblistghana.com/wp-content/uploads/KP-logo1-250x48.jpg"class="attachment-post-thumbnailwp-post-image"alt="KPlogo.JPG"title="KPlogo.JPG"/><h2>JobDescription</h2><p>KnightPi&eacute;soldwasestablishedin1921andisaninternationalconsultingcompanyprovidingengineeringandenvironmentalservicesforthemining,power,water,transportationandconstructionsectors.</p><p>Withofficesaroundtheglobe,ourteamofover800experiencedprofessionalsdelivershighqualityspecializedservicesandinnovativesolutionsthatrespectsocial,environmentalandeconomicresponsibilities.</p><p>TheKnightPi&eacute;soldGhanaofficewasestablishedin1988andcurrentlyemploysover30people.TheofficeisworkingextensivelywithintheminingindustryinGhanaandinneighbouringcountriessuchasCoted&rsquo;Ivoire,Mali,BurkinaFasoandSierraLeonetoprovidecivilandgeotechnicalengineeringservices.</p><p>Reportingtotheboard,theemphasisonthisroleistoensurethefinancialintegrityandhaveoverallresponsibilityforourGhanaoperations.AspartofoursuccessionplanningyouwillworkalongsidethecurrentRegionalManagerfor6&ndash;12monthsbeforeassumingfullresponsibilityfortheoffice.</p><p>Majorresponsibilitiesinclude:</p><p>&bull;Themanagementofgeotechnicalengineeringprojectsincludingbutnotlimitedtotailingsdamsandinfrastructureforminingprojects<br/>&bull;Responsibilityforthefinancialperformanceoftheregion<br/>&bull;Activerelationshipbuildingwiththeultimategoalofturningrelationshipsintobusinessventuresandcommercialoutcomes<br/>&bull;Managementofteammembersandleadershipacrosstheworkgroupincludingperformancemanagement,<atitle="recruitment"href="http://joblistghana.com">recruitment</a>andretention<br/>&bull;Empowerstafftoexecuteanddeliverqualityandsafetyfocusedprojectsinadherencetocompanysafetystandards.<br/>&bull;Travelwhenrequiredtoundertakefieldworkincludingtestpitting,drillingandconstructionsupervision.</p><p>Qualificationsandskillsrequired:</p><p>&bull;10+years&rsquo;experienceinengineeringconsultingservicestotheminingindustry<br/>&bull;EngineeringqualificationsandregisteredasaCharteredEngineer(orEuropeanEquivalent)<br/>&bull;Demonstratedsuccessatidentifyingandsecuringbusiness/growthopportunities<br/>&bull;Demonstratedcommercialacumen,strongbusinessanalyticalskillsandstrongnegotiationskills<br/>&bull;Excellentprojectmanagementskillsandtheabilitytoeffectivelyreviewanddirectprojects<br/>&bull;Strongteambuilding,employeemanagement&amp;developmentability<br/>&bull;Abilitytoprioritiseandmanagetimeeffectivelyandbeabletoworktotightdeadlineswithanumberofcompetingdemands<br/>&bull;AnabilitytounderstandFrenchwouldbeusefulbutnotessential.</p><p>ThispositionislocatedinAccra,inthepopularAirportResidentialArea,onlyminutesfromtheinternationalairportandwithin15minutesofOsu,homeofmanyofAccra&#8217;sbars,restaurantsandshops.</p><p>Agenerousremunerationpackageisoffered,paidinUSDwhichincludesparticipationinthecompanybonusscheme.HousinginAccraissuppliedandinternationalschoolfeespaidifrequired.</p><divstyle="font-size:0px;height:0px;line-height:0px;margin:0;padding:0;clear:both"></div><divid="listingAd"><left><ahref="http://joblistghana.com/about/contact-us/">Reportthisjobasscam</a></left><br><br><left><ahref="http://joblistghana.com"><imgsrc="http://cdn.joblistghana.com/wp-content/uploads/AdvertiseHereBanner.jpg"border="0"alt="AdvertiseHere"></a></left></div><h2>HowtoApply</h2><p>Ifyouwouldliketoapplyforthisrolepleaseemaildetailsto:knightpiesoldrecruitment@gmail.com</p><divstyle="font-size:0px;height:0px;line-height:0px;margin:0;padding:0;clear:both"></div><pclass="meta"><em>JobCategories:<ahref='http://joblistghana.com/job-category/featured'>Featured</a>and<ahref='http://joblistghana.com/job-category/management-recruitment-in-ghana'>ManagementRecruitmentinGhana</a>.JobTypes:<ahref='http://joblistghana.com/job-type/full-time'>Full-Time</a>.Salary:<ahref='http://joblistghana.com/salary/100000-and-above'>100,000andabove</a>.Jobexpiresin<strong>39days</strong>.</em></p><pclass="stats">5288&nbsp;totalv ld.com"rel="nofollow">KnightPiesold</a>&ndash;Postedby<ahref="http://joblistghana.com/author/knightpiesold">knightpiesold</a>&ndash;<strong>Accra</strong>,GreaterAccra,Ghana</p><divclass="clear"></div></div><!--endsection_header--><divclass="section_content"><imgwidth="250"height="48"src="http://cdn.joblistghana.com/wp-content/uploads/KP-logo1-250x48.jpg"class="attachment-post-thumbnailwp-post-image"alt="KPlogo.JPG"title="KPlogo.JPG"/><h2>JobDescription</h2><p>KnightPi&eacute;soldwasestablishedin1921andisaninternationalconsultingcompanyprovidingengineeringandenvironmentalservicesforthemining,power,water,transportationandconstructionsectors.</p><p>Withofficesaroundtheglobe,ourteamofover800experiencedprofessionalsdelivershighqualityspecializedservicesandinnovativesolutionsthatrespectsocial,environmentalandeconomicresponsibilities.</p><p>TheKnightPi&eacute;soldGhanaofficewasestablishedin1988andcurrentlyemploysover30people.TheofficeisworkingextensivelywithintheminingindustryinGhanaandinneighbouringcountriessuchasCoted&rsquo;Ivoire,Mali,BurkinaFasoandSierraLeonetoprovidecivilandgeotechnicalengineeringservices.</p><p>Reportingtotheboard,theemphasisonthisroleistoensurethefinancialintegrityandhaveoverallresponsibilityforourGhanaoperations.AspartofoursuccessionplanningyouwillworkalongsidethecurrentRegionalManagerfor6&ndash;12monthsbeforeassumingfullresponsibilityfortheoffice.</p><p>Majorresponsibilitiesinclude:</p><p>&bull;Themanagementofgeotechnicalengineeringprojectsincludingbutnotlimitedtotailingsdamsandinfrastructureforminingprojects<br/>&bull;Responsibilityforthefinancialperformanceoftheregion<br/>&bull;Activerelationshipbuildingwiththeultimategoalofturningrelationshipsintobusinessventuresandcommercialoutcomes<br/>&bull;Managementofteammembersandleadershipacrosstheworkgroupincludingperformancemanagement,<atitle="recruitment"href="http://joblistghana.com">recruitment</a>andretention<br/>&bull;Empowerstafftoexecuteanddeliverqualityandsafetyfocusedprojectsinadherencetocompanysafetystandards.<br/>&bull;Travelwhenrequiredtoundertakefieldworkincludingtestpitting,drillingandconstructionsupervision.</p><p>Qualificationsandskillsrequired:</p><p>&bull;10+years&rsquo;experienceinengineeringconsultingservicestotheminingindustry<br/>&bull;EngineeringqualificationsandregisteredasaCharteredEngineer(orEuropeanEquivalent)<br/>&bull;Demonstratedsuccessatidentifyingandsecuringbusiness/growthopportunities<br/>&bull;Demonstratedcommercialacumen,strongbusinessanalyticalskillsandstrongnegotiationskills<br/>&bull;Excellentprojectmanagementskillsandtheabilitytoeffectivelyreviewanddirectprojects<br/>&bull;Strongteambuilding,employeemanagement&amp;developmentability<br/>&bull;Abilitytoprioritiseandmanagetimeeffectivelyandbeabletoworktotightdeadlineswithanumberofcompetingdemands<br/>&bull;AnabilitytounderstandFrenchwouldbeusefulbutnotessential.</p><p>ThispositionislocatedinAccra,inthepopularAirportResidentialArea,onlyminutesfromtheinternationalairportandwithin15minutesofOsu,homeofmanyofAccra&#8217;sbars,restaurantsandshops.</p><p>Agenerousremunerationpackageisoffered,paidinUSDwhichincludesparticipationinthecompanybonusscheme.HousinginAccraissuppliedandinternationalschoolfeespaidifrequired.</p><divstyle="font-size:0px;height:0px;line-height:0px;margin:0;padding:0;clear:both"></div><divid="listingAd"><left><ahref="http://joblistghana.com/about/contact-us/">Reportthisjobasscam</a></left><br><br><left><ahref="http://joblistghana.com"><imgsrc="http://cdn.joblistghana.com/wp-content/uploads/AdvertiseHereBanner.jpg"border="0"alt="AdvertiseHere"></a></left></div><h2>HowtoApply</h2><p>Ifyouwouldliketoapplyforthisrolepleaseemaildetailsto:knightpiesoldrecruitment@gmail.com</p><divstyle="font-size:0px;height:0px;line-height:0px;margin:0;padding:0;clear:both"></div><pclass="meta"><em>JobCategories:<ahref='http://joblistghana.com/job-category/featured'>Featured</a>and<ahref='http://joblistghana.com/job-category/management-recruitment-in-ghana'>ManagementRecruitmentinGhana
